# FixedWidthFieldConfiguration.FormatterType method

Optional class which is used to control custom serialization/deserialization of this field. This class must implement the [`ITextFormatter`](../../TheCodingMonkey.Serialization/ITextFormatter.md) interface.

```csharp
public FixedWidthFieldConfiguration FormatterType(Type formatter)
```
